name: Puroma 2 Pack TSA Approved Luggage Locks, 4 Digit Combination Travel Locks Resettable Code Lock with Zinc Alloy Body for Suitcase, Toolbox, Backpack, Bag, Gym Locker (Black)
short_description: Enhanced Security: Puroma luggage lock offers a 4-digit combination that provides 10,000 unique possibilities, making it significantly more secure than normal 3-digit locks. The white numerals on the black dials make it easy to read your code, even in low light conditions.

Durable Construction: Puroma travel lock is crafted from premium zinc alloy and long-lasting, sturdy steel, designed to withstand sawing, hammering, and prying attempts, providing maximum scratch protection for daily use and travel.

Flexible Cable: With the flexible cable and portable size, our backpack lock is perfect for handling backpacks, zippers, equipment cases, gun cases and more, making it more versatile than ordinary shackles.

TSA-Approved: Our TSA-Approved locks allow TSA agents to unlock your luggage with their key without causing any damage. Plus, the agent has to relock your luggage to remove their key, ensuring that your belongings stay safe during your travels.

Wide Application: Its lightweight and unlock button design make this TSA lock for luggage convenient to carry and use. This storage lock is an ideal choice for protecting items when on business trips, traveling, hiking, fitness, etc.

short_description: LIFETIME REPLACEMENT GUARANTEE – We individually test every HERO TSA Lock in the USA before shipping. And every order comes backed by our lifetime replacement guarantee. If anything ever goes wrong we will send you a replacement absolutely free!

ALL-PURPOSE COMBINATION LOCKS – These versatile combination locks are great for lockers, gym bags, & suitcases and are designed with a 4-digit resettable pin that’s 10x harder to crack than a 3-digit combination. Important for added security and safety.

LUGGAGE WILL STAY LOCKED – Our heavy-duty combination locks are designed to keep thieves out but still allow TSA to check bags when they’re going through security. And because the TSA can’t take their key out without relocking, you can be assured your luggage will stay locked.

Perfect for avid travelers, gym goers, and anyone who loves spending time on the go, get these combination locks for your bags, luggage, and suitcases and ensure you leave and arrive with all your things safe and sound.
